Html:
Sorry if the question has been asked and answered.

Is there a way to disable any modification of source HTML when doing a save on an HTML document?

All I want to do is load some HTML, find a tag or two, inspect them, maybe modify them and re-save the file.

 

Regardless of altering the HTML in way, any time I load HTML and do a save on it, it changes tags and tries to optimize or fix things.  I want to stop this behavior.

 

Please help.

 

Thanks.
